subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Tim Duncan had 24 points and 13 rebounds, and the San Antonio Spurs got their title defense off to a successful start last night with a 106-97 victory against the visiting Portland Trail Blazers.
snippet: Tim Duncan had 24 points and 13 rebounds, and the San Antonio Spurs got their title defense off to a successful start last night with a 106-97 victory against the visiting Portland Trail Blazers.
